metadata.description: macOS Cache Locations Configuration for Cache Cleaner Application
metadata.author: Cache App Development Team

system_caches.name: System Library Caches
system_caches.description: Essential system cache files used by macOS system components
system_caches.recommendation: Do not modify - can affect system stability

system_caches.name: System-wide Caches
system_caches.description: Cache files shared across all users on the system
system_caches.recommendation: Proceed with caution - may affect system-wide applications

system_caches.name: User Temporary Files
system_caches.description: Per-user temporary files and caches managed by macOS
system_caches.recommendation: Let system manage - manual cleanup not recommended

system_caches.name: System Temporary Files
system_caches.description: Temporary files that persist across reboots
system_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - files are temporary

system_caches.name: Temporary Files
system_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - files are temporary

user_caches.name: User Library Caches
user_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - applications will regenerate as needed

user_caches.name: User Application Support
user_caches.description: Application support files, some may contain cache-like data
user_caches.recommendation: Review before cleaning - may contain important user data

user_caches.name: Sandboxed Application Data
user_caches.description: Data for sandboxed applications including caches
user_caches.recommendation: Review per application - some contain important data

user_caches.name: User Logs
user_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - logs can be regenerated

user_caches.name: User Preferences
user_caches.description: User preference files, some may cache settings
user_caches.recommendation: Do not clean - contains important user settings

application_caches.name: Google Chrome Cache
application_caches.description: Chrome browser cache including web pages, images, and media
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - will improve browser performance

application_caches.name: Safari Cache
application_caches.description: Safari browser cache including web pages and resources
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - will improve browser performance

application_caches.name: Firefox Cache
application_caches.description: Firefox browser cache including web content and media
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - will improve browser performance

application_caches.name: Spotify Cache
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - music will re-download as needed

application_caches.name: Adobe Applications Cache
application_caches.description: Cache files for Adobe Creative Suite applications
application_caches.recommendation: Review before cleaning - may contain work-in-progress data

application_caches.name: Visual Studio Code Cache
application_caches.description: VS Code editor cache including extensions and workspace data
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - extensions will reinstall as needed

application_caches.name: Xcode Cache
application_caches.description: Xcode build cache and derived data
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - will rebuild projects as needed

application_caches.name: Docker Cache
application_caches.recommendation: Review before cleaning - may contain important containers

application_caches.name: Slack Cache
application_caches.description: Slack application cache including messages and media
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - messages will reload as needed

application_caches.name: Discord Cache
application_caches.description: Discord application cache including media and messages
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - media will re-download as needed

application_caches.name: Mail Cache
application_caches.description: macOS Mail application cache including email data
application_caches.recommendation: Review before cleaning - may contain important email data

application_caches.name: Photos Cache
application_caches.description: Photos application cache including thumbnails and previews
application_caches.recommendation: Safe to clean - thumbnails will regenerate as needed

special_locations.name: Kernel Extensions Cache
special_locations.description: Caches kernel extensions for faster loading
special_locations.recommendation: Do not modify - critical for system stability

special_locations.name: Font Cache
special_locations.description: Font rendering cache for system fonts
special_locations.recommendation: Do not modify - affects font rendering

special_locations.name: Launch Services Cache
special_locations.recommendation: Do not modify - affects application launching

permissions_info.user_accessible: Can be accessed and modified by the current user without special privileges
permissions_info.system_managed: Managed by macOS system, manual modification not recommended
permissions_info.sandboxed: Access restricted to the specific application due to sandboxing

safety_levels.safe: Low risk - safe to clean without affecting system or application functionality
safety_levels.moderate: Medium risk - review contents before cleaning, may affect some functionality
safety_levels.dangerous: High risk - not recommended to clean, may cause system instability
